title: Trump Impeachment Defense, 2020 Polls
itunes:title: Trump Impeachment Defense, 2020 Polls
description:
Kevin discussed the latest news on President Trump’s impeachment trial and polling in the democratic presidential race with panelists: Eli Yokley, Political reporter for Morning Consult, Wendy Benjaminson, Bloomberg Politics Editor and David Mark, deputy news editor at the Washington Examiner. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
